name: Grive
tagline: A command line interface for google docs, written in go.
body:
### Grive.

Grive is a CLI (Command line interface) for Google Drive, it's written in [Go](https://golang.org/).
To build it you need Go lang along with the dependencies specified in the read me. 

Usage is incredibly simple.
`grive upload [title] [filename]` to upload file  
`grive remove [title]` to remove file
`grive rename [target_file_name] [source_file_name]`  to rename file
Made@HackRU
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
